adjectives.description: acromegalic (comparative more acromegalic, superlative most acromegalic)

entries.meaning: (pathology) Pertaining to or characteristic of acromegaly. [from 19th c.]
examples: At that moment a match flared on the far side of the room and illuminated the ruddy acromegalic features of Smirke  […]

entries.meaning: (pathology) A person affected by acromegaly. [from 19th c.]
